name: Membership
description: Represents a specific Member in the context of a specific Group

fields.name: role
fields.description:
The role of the Member within this group. This determines the member's action and visibility
permissions. This may be null in cases where the member does not have an active status, i.e. PENDING_PAYMENT

fields.name: rsvpStats
fields.description: Rsvp statistics associated with this member
